end.find_end_city: The City at the End of the Game​

story.root: The heart and story of the game
story.mine_stone: Mine stone with your new pickaxe
story.obtain_armor: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor
story.deflect_arrow: Deflect an arrow with a shield
story.form_obsidian: Form and mine a block of Obsidian
story.enter_the_nether: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal
story.enchant_item: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table
story.cure_zombie_villager: Weaken and then cure a zombie villager

nether.fast_travel: Use the Nether to travel 7km in the Overworld​
nether.find_fortress: Break your way into a Nether Fortress​
nether.return_to_sender: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball​
nether.obtain_blaze_rod: Relieve a Blaze of its rod​
nether.uneasy_alliance: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it.
nether.all_potions: Have every potion effect applied at the same time​
nether.all_effects: Have every effect applied at the same time​
nether.create_full_beacon: Bring a beacon to full power
nether.ride_strider: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick
nether.loot_bastion: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant
nether.charge_respawn_anchor: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum
nether.netherite_armor: Get a full suit of Netherite armor

end.dragon_breath: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle.
end.find_end_city: Go on in, what could happen?​
end.levitate: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

adventure.shoot_arrow: Shoot something with a bow and arrow​
adventure.kill_all_mobs: Kill one of every hostile monster​
adventure.totem_of_undying: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death​
adventure.summon_iron_golem: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village​
adventure.sniper_duel: Kill a skeleton with an arrow from more than 50 meters
adventure.voluntary_exile: Kill a raid captain.  Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...
adventure.hero_of_the_village: Successfully defend a village from a raid
adventure.two_birds_one_arrow: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow
adventure.whos_the_pillager_now: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
adventure.arbalistic: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot
adventure.honey_block_slide: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall
adventure.bullseye: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

husbandry.root: The world is full of friends and food​
husbandry.plant_seed: Plant a seed and watch it grow​
husbandry.balanced_diet: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you​
husbandry.break_diamond_hoe: Completely use up a diamond hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
husbandry.tactical_fishing: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!
husbandry.safely_harvest_honey: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees
husbandry.silk_touch_nest: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch
husbandry.obtain_netherite_hoe: Use a Netherite ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
